agent.agentNotes: Brukt til nettarkivering for å høste inn nettsteder og bevare all HTML-innhold, bilder, skript og lenkede ressurser.

event.eventDetail: Høstet nettstedet «https://example.no», inkludert alle sider, bilder, PDF-er og lenkede ressurser, i henhold til den planlagte nettarkiveringsinnsamlingen utført av Nasjonalbiblioteket
event.outcomeDetail: Totalt antall sider høstet: 234; total datastørrelse: 1,2 GB; alle URL-er ble arkivert i WARC-format.

agent.agentNotes: Apache NiFi er et verktøy for automatisering av dataflyter som muliggjør utforming og administrasjon av komplekse datapipelines.

event.eventDetail: The filename was changed to conform to current file naming convention.
event.outcomeDetail: Filename changed from NN_TR_2011_01_31_18_40.mp4 to NRK_TR_2011_01_31_18_40.mp4.

agent.agentNotes: Beregner MD5-sjekksummer og verifiserer dem mot lagret sjekksumm-manifest.

event.eventDetail: MD5-sjekksummer ble beregnet for alle filer i pakken og kontrollert mot lagrede verdier i manifestfilen

agent.agentNotes: Guymager is an open-source disk imaging tool for forensic and preservation purposes, used to create exact disk images including metadata, filesystem structure, and slack space.

event.eventDetail: Created a bit-level disk image of storage medium 'ArchiveDisk01'. Included all files, filesystem metadata, slack space, and unallocated sectors.
event.outcomeDetail: Disk image created in E01 format.

agent.agentNotes: GNU coreutils md5sum; commonly used in Linux environments to calculate MD5 checksums for file integrity verification.

event.eventDetail: Calculated MD5 checksum for E-ARK SIP package nb_sip_0001 using md5sum to verify integrity during transfer and archival.

agent.agentNotes: ExifTool 12.60 by Phil Harvey, used for extracting metadata from image and video files.

event.eventDetail: Extracted technical and descriptive metadata from image file DSC_0456.JPG using ExifTool.
event.outcomeDetail: Image: format JPEG, resolution 6000x4000 pixels, 24-bit color; Camera: Nikon D850; Lens: 24-70mm f/2.8; Exposure: 1/125 sec at f/8; ISO: 100; File size: 18.2 MB.

agent.agentNotes: AudioInspector is a professional software tool for automated analysis, quality assessment, and metadata management of audio files, primarily used in archiving, restoration, and digitization workflows.

event.eventDetail: Wav-files were analyzed for quality control and documentation.
event.outcomeDetail: An XML metadata file was created, containing detailed analysis results.

agent.agentNotes: Widely used for media conversion and encoding.

event.eventDetail: onverted archival MOV files to MXF/Op1a format with JPEG2000 video codec and PCM audio codec.
event.outcomeDetail: command=ffmpeg -i input.mov -c:v jpeg2000 -c:a pcm_s16le output.mxf; container=MXF/Op1a; videoCodec=JPEG2000; audioCodec=PCM; integrityChecked=yes

agent.agentNotes: Amazon Web Services Command Line Interface; transfer executed to Amazon S3 using multipart upload; checksum verification enabled.

event.eventDetail: Transferred AIP package from on-premises preservation storage to Amazon S3 (eu-north-1 region) using AWS CLI v2.15.21. Multipart upload was performed with checksum validation (MD5) to ensure integrity during transfer.
Validated E-ARK SIP using DPS Validation workflow v.a00f683
event.outcomeDetail: validated against profile E-ARK-SIP-v2-2-0, NB-SIP-STRUCTURE-1.0 and NB-SIP-MOVINGIMAGES-PROFILE-1.0.

agent.agentNotes: Opensource antivirus program designed to detect malicious software. Virus definitions were updated immediately before execution.

event.eventDetail: All files in the SIP were scanned using ClamAV prior to transfer. Recursive scan covered 1,245 files.

agent.agentNotes: Opensource antivirus program designed to detect malicious software. Virus definitions were updated immediately before execution.

event.eventDetail: All files in the SIP were scanned using ClamAV prior to transfer. Recursive scan covered 1,245 files.
event.outcomeDetail: ClamAV reported the presence of the signature Win.Trojan.MacroVirus-12345 in file_2026.xml. The file was retained in the SIP due to its archival value and inability to obtain a clean replacement.
